content: The project involved exploring and experimenting with various models and datasets for image captioning, followed by fine-tuning a selected model (FuseCap) using a custom dataset. The process began with understanding current models and datasets, designing a workflow, and experimenting with vision models from Hugging Face and other sources. Fine-tuning FuseCap was then carried out, and the generated captions were tokenized for effective use in subsequent applications. A web API was developed using Flask to interface with the FuseCap model. The project aimed to improve resource efficiency during fine-tuning through techniques like quantization, LoRA, and QLoRA.
